post.body: i am not sure wether or not this is a side effect of sikkmod or due to the fact that i am running doom at 1080 which it was never designed for but despite playing with the crosshair settings for over an hour i am having this issue where most rounds will impact slightly below and to the right of where the cross hair is actually located. this is causing me no end of issues and resulting in difficulty hitting creatures behind chest high railings and around corners where precision aiming is needed. has anyone experienced this issue and does anyone know a fix ?
